00041 #include "pizHashTable.h"

00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 
00046 #include <stdlib.h>

00048 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 
00051 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_SIZE 157
00052 
00053 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 
00056 PIZHashTable *pizHashTableNew (long size)
00057 {
00058     PIZHashTable *x = NULL;
00059         
00060     if (x = (PIZHashTable *)malloc (sizeof(PIZHashTable))) {
00061         x->flags = PIZ_HASHTABLE_FLAG_NONE;
00062         x->count = 0;
00063         x->size  = PIZ_DEFAULT_SIZE;
00064         
00065         if (size > 0) {
00066             x->size = size;
00067         }
00068         
00069         if (!(x->hashTable = (PIZLinklist **)calloc (x->size, sizeof(PIZLinklist *)))) {
00070             free (x);
00071             x = NULL;
00072         }
00073     }
00074     
00075     return x;
00076 }
00077 
00078 void pizHashTableSetFlags (PIZHashTable *x, long flags)
00079 {
00080     x->flags = flags;
00081 }
00082 
00083 void pizHashTableFree (PIZHashTable *x)
00084 {
00085     if (x) {
00086         long i;
00087         
00088         pizHashTableClear (x);
00089         
00090         for (i = 0; i < x->size; i++) {
00091             if (x->hashTable[i]) {
00092                 pizLinklistFree (x->hashTable[i]);
00093             }
00094         }
00095             
00096         free (x->hashTable);
00097         x->hashTable = NULL;
00098         
00099         free (x);
00100     }
00101 }
00102 
00103 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00104 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 
00106 void pizHashTableClear (PIZHashTable *x)
00107 {
00108     long i;
00109     
00110     for (i = 0; i < x->size; i++) {
00111         if (x->hashTable[i]) {
00112             if (x->flags & PIZ_HASHTABLE_FLAG_FREE_MEMORY) {
00113                 PIZHashTableElement *element = NULL;
00114                 PIZHashTableElement *nextElement = NULL;
00115                 
00116                 pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->hashTable[i], 0, (void **)&element);
00117                 
00118                 while (element) {
00119                     pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->hashTable[i], (void *)element, (void **)&nextElement);
00120                     free (element->ptr);
00121                     element->ptr = NULL;
00122                     element = nextElement;
00123                 }
00124             }
00125 
00126             pizLinklistClear (x->hashTable[i]);
00127         }
00128     }
00129     
00130     x->count = 0;
00131 }
00132 
00133 PIZError pizHashTableAdd (PIZHashTable *x, long key, void *ptr)
00134 {
00135     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00136     
00137     if (ptr && (key >= 0)) {
00138         long                p = key % x->size;
00139         PIZHashTableElement *element = NULL;
00140         
00141         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00142         
00143         if (!x->hashTable[p]) {
00144             x->hashTable[p] = pizLinklistNew ( );
00145         }
00146         
00147         if (x->hashTable[p]) {
00148             if (element = (PIZHashTableElement *)malloc(sizeof(PIZHashTableElement))) {
00149                 element->key = key;
00150                 element->ptr = ptr;
00151                 
00152                 err |= pizLinklistAppend (x->hashTable[p], element);
00153                 
00154                 if (err) {
00155                     free (element);
00156                     element = NULL;
00157                 } else {
00158                     x->count ++;
00159                 }
00160             } else {
00161                 err |= PIZ_MEMORY;
00162             }
00163         } else {
00164             err |= PIZ_MEMORY;
00165         }
00166     }
00167     
00168     return err;
00169 }
00170 
00171 PIZError pizHashTableRemoveByKeyAndPtr (PIZHashTable *x, long key, void *ptr)
00172 {
00173     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00174     
00175     if (ptr && (key >= 0)) {
00176         long p = key % x->size;
00177         
00178         if (x->hashTable[p]) {
00179             PIZHashTableElement *element = NULL;
00180             PIZHashTableElement *nextElement = NULL;
00181                             
00182             pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->hashTable[p], 0, (void **)&element);
00183                             
00184             while (element) {
00185                 pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->hashTable[p], (void *)element, (void **)&nextElement);
00186                 
00187                 if ((element->key == key) && (element->ptr == ptr)) {
00188                     err = PIZ_GOOD;
00189                     
00190                     if (x->flags & PIZ_HASHTABLE_FLAG_FREE_MEMORY) {
00191                         free (element->ptr);
00192                         element->ptr = NULL;
00193                     }
00194                         
00195                     err |= pizLinklistRemoveByPtr (x->hashTable[p], element);
00196                     break;
00197                 }
00198                     
00199                 element = nextElement;
00200             }
00201         }
00202     }
00203     
00204     return err;
00205 }
00206 
00207 PIZError pizHashTablePtrByKey (const PIZHashTable *x, long key, void **ptr)
00208 {
00209     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00210     
00211     if (*ptr) {
00212         (*ptr) = NULL;
00213     }
00214     
00215     if (key >= 0) {
00216         long p = key % x->size;
00217         
00218         if (x->hashTable[p]) {
00219             PIZHashTableElement *element = NULL;
00220             PIZHashTableElement *nextElement = NULL;
00221                             
00222             pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->hashTable[p], 0, (void **)&element);
00223                             
00224             while (element) {
00225                 pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->hashTable[p], (void *)element, (void **)&nextElement);
00226                 
00227                 if (element->key == key) {
00228                     (*ptr) = element->ptr;
00229                     err = PIZ_GOOD;
00230                     break; 
00231                 }
00232                     
00233                 element = nextElement;
00234             }
00235         }
00236     }
00237     
00238     return err;
00239 }
00240 
00241 bool pizHashTableContainsKey (const PIZHashTable *x, long key)
00242 {
00243     bool k = false;
00244     
00245     if (key >= 0) {
00246         long p = key % x->size;
00247         
00248         if (x->hashTable[p]) {
00249             PIZHashTableElement *element = NULL;
00250             PIZHashTableElement *nextElement = NULL;
00251                             
00252             pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->hashTable[p], 0, (void **)&element);
00253                             
00254             while (element) {
00255                 pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->hashTable[p], (void *)element, (void **)&nextElement);
00256                 
00257                 if (element->key == key) {
00258                     k = true;
00259                     break; 
00260                 }
00261                     
00262                 element = nextElement;
00263             }
00264         }
00265     }
00266     
00267     return k;
00268 }
00269 
00270 long pizHashTableCount (const PIZHashTable *x)
00271 {
00272     return (x->count);
00273 }
